content: I was thinking about implementing generalised HRTBs (some discussion here: https://internals.rust-lang.org/t/generalising-hrtbs/11417) and I was just looking for some pointers about where to start. I've had a look around the "Guide to Rustc Development" and in particular I'm not sure whether to go with the "old style" or "new style" (presumably "chalk") trait solving at this point?
